resources.string: Please fill all the field to register
Please use valid E-mail to register
Password must be 8 characters long, include at least 1 upper case, 1 digits and 1 special character!

string-array.name: pizza_menu_descriptions
string-array.item: The pizza is topped with sweet boba pearls– plus brown sugar bubble tea sauce and “a brushing of cheese.” It’s one way to interpret the popular sugary milk tea loaded with black sugar pearls in a pizza form.
Send your tastebuds into a cheesy frenzy with a divine combination of 4 cheeses - mozzarella, parmesan, cheddar and cream cheese.
Classic fan favorite Hawaiian, joining the festive season with blossom stuffed crust.
All-time favourite to make the season of love a little sweeter for all Hawaiian pizza lovers. Tender chicken ham combined with sweet and succulent pineapple chunks for a taste of the good old days.
An all-time favourite. Tender chicken ham combined with sweet and succulent pineapple chunks for a taste of the good old days.
Have a FIERY Good Time at Pizza Hut! Pan Crust Pizza topped w generous chunks of mala marinated chicken and 100% mozzarella cheese, drizzled w Pizza Hut’s in-house mala sauce.
Combining the aromatic flavour of beef pepperoni and 100% mozzarella cheese. Classic treat that’s always a great choice.
Delightful combination of garden fresh mushrooms, onions, olives and capsicums, sweetened with pineapple chunks and diced tomatoes.
